entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure: 98.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: SSW 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
